price: 3. Waa intaasoo aad naftaada ku disho (murugo) inaysan rumayn (Xaqa) darteed.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
